name: Parastick (Stevannus Lake)
description:
You have enjoyed your peaceful life journey on a human fat for a while, and now you have to stay alive by jumping and bouncing around the deadly narrow blood vessels in the human body with a water tsunami that comes towards you and can kill you in a second. Slingshot yourself, bounce around the vessels, stick and absorb on other living red blood cells so you don’t fall and ruin your own life. Collect plasma, spin the lucky wheel and get platelets to discover new skins to help you be the next legendary parasite to reach the incredible distance in the vessels you can ever imagine!

Key Features :
💥 Human Blood Vessels Theme. World visual and interactive objects are designed to give the feeling of exploring inside human blood vessels.
💥 Absorb Behaviour. Player will automatically absorb the cell’s energy that he is sticking on and will affect his body size. Player will be either become bigger or smaller depending on which side of the cell he is sticking on.
💥 Double Slingshot. Player will be able to slingshot again while he is flying in the air. Player will need to recharge the double slingshot ability by bouncing or sticking.
💥 Unique Skin Abilities. Every type of skins offer different kind of aesthetic & values. Player will be able to use different skins when the other skins have unlocked. And based on the type of the skin, it offers the player different abilities.

#################################################

Creator Notes

Team: Mega Shock Entertainment (3 Artists & 3 Programmers)
Engine: Unity
Duration: 5 Months (Apr 2019 - Sep 2019)

Credits:
